headline: HSBC upgrades AIG, Chubb on their ability to navigate macro uncertainties
summary: Investing.com -- HSBC upgraded insurance company’s American International Group (NYSE:AIG) and Chubb (NYSE:CB) Ltd to "Buy" from "Hold" given their strong risk management, solid capital positions, and ability to navigate macroeconomic uncertainty.

content.title: HSBC upgrades AIG, Chubb on their ability to navigate macro uncertainties
